Purpose: To detect MYOD1 gene mutations in tumor specimens using next-generation sequencing for clinical diagnosis and management.
Container: Sterile container on ice for fresh/frozen tissue; FFPE tissue block or uncharged microscope slide for FFPE sections
Equipment: Microtome, DNA extraction kit, Qubit fluorometer, NGS library preparation kit, Illumina (or equivalent) NGS platform, thermocycler, bioinformatics workstation/software
